footer.copyright: ¬© 2026 FUDAMBIENT - For a green and sustainable future

hero.description: We are an organization of professionals working with the purpose of advising and executing development and sustainability projects, considering the socio-environmental components of the territory.

rivers.title: River recovery and comprehensive management processes
rivers.description: Geomorphological interventions and dredging in prioritized sections to improve hydraulic dynamics, reduce risks and strengthen watershed resilience.

sanitation.title: Individual sanitation systems implemented
sanitation.description: Design and installation of decentralized solutions for wastewater treatment in rural communities, with a focus on public health and sustainability.

education.title: Environmental education and community management processes
education.description: Participatory support to strengthen responsible land use and ensure the permanence of environmental solutions.

restoration.title: Stabilization and ecological restoration interventions
restoration.description: Execution of bioengineering works for erosion control, mass movements and sediment contribution in critical areas.

approach.title: Engineering that understands the territory
approach.description: FUDAMBIENT is the The Foundation for Social Development, the Environment, Housing, Recreation, Sports, Commerce, and Employment. We integrate civil engineering, environmental management and community action to promote sustainable projects that strengthen development, quality of life and socio-environmental balance.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: CARING FOR THE EARTH THAT SUSTAINS LIFE
mission.description: FUDAMBIENT is an organization dedicated to advising and executing development projects with a socio-environmental approach, optimizing economic, social and environmental resources. We have an interdisciplinary team of specialized professionals who work with commitment, ethics and cooperation to contribute to sustainable development and customer satisfaction.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.description: Our organization aims to lead the region with cutting-edge solutions in the field of engineering, through the union of different disciplines for the consolidation of construction processes that involve high-quality and efficiency components in the diagnosis, start, execution and completion of a project, committed to its socio-economic and environmental sustainability.

specialties.title: Our Specialties
specialties.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions in civil engineering and environmental management for sustainable development

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Building a sustainable future with responsible engineering

territory.title: Designed for the territory
territory.description: Each project is born from technical analysis, environmental context and social dynamics, to build solutions that last over time.

cards.left: We design and execute engineering solutions that respond to the real conditions of the territory, integrating technical, environmental and social criteria for sustainable and lasting development.
cards.right: We accompany communities and institutions in the planning and execution of projects, promoting active participation and territorial ownership as the axis of sustainable development.

hero.label: About Us
hero.title: Engineering with purpose
hero.description: Our commitment is based on environmental sustainability, community well-being and technical rigor in every project. We transform environmental challenges into innovative solutions.

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.description: FUDAMBIENT is a foundation dedicated to environmental engineering with more than two decades of experience. We work with communities, companies and governments to develop projects that protect the environment and generate sustainable development.

items.context: We design from the environmental and social context
items.analysis: We don't apply recipes: we analyze each territory
items.community: We work with communities, not just for them
items.technical: We execute with technical criteria and responsibility

history.title: Our history
history.description: Since our beginnings, we have worked tirelessly to transform territories and communities. With more than a decade of experience, we have developed projects that integrate engineering, sustainability and community participation, generating a positive and lasting impact on the environment.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.description: Every project we develop generates measurable and lasting impact on ecosystems and communities. Our results speak for themselves.

howWeWork.title: How do we work?
howWeWork.description: We work from a deep understanding of the territory, integrating technical knowledge, community participation and environmental commitment in each project.

step1.title: We listen to the territory
step1.description: Each project begins by understanding the environmental, social and cultural context of the territory.

step2.title: We build with communities
step2.description: We work participatively with communities and local stakeholders.

step3.title: We apply responsible engineering
step3.description: We design and implement viable technical solutions with a focus on sustainability.

step4.title: We accompany over time
step4.description: We monitor to ensure positive and lasting impacts.

hero.label: Services
hero.title: Our Services
hero.description: Engineering applied to the territory for the design, implementation and support of sustainable solutions with a community and technical approach.

education.title: Environmental Education
education.description: We develop and implement educational strategies to reduce water resource pollution and promote water care for future generations as a fundamental, cross-cutting and philosophical approach to all our work.

hydraulicUrbanism.title: Hydraulic infrastructure and urbanism
hydraulicUrbanism.description: We build hydraulic infrastructure for efficient water resource management, including aqueducts, sewer systems, pumping stations and irrigation and drainage systems, integrated with sustainable urbanism solutions aimed at proper territorial planning and development.

designConstruction.title: Design and construction of works
designConstruction.description: We design and build civil, environmental and forestry works that contribute to the sustainable development of territories, incorporating landscape management tools and ecological restoration systems to promote healthier and more resilient environments for life.

urbanManagement.title: Urban management and maintenance
urbanManagement.description: We carry out planting, maintenance and management of urban trees to keep our cities green and vibrant, promoting biodiversity conservation, improving the urban landscape and enhancing community well-being.

basicSanitation.title: Basic sanitation
basicSanitation.description: We implement basic sanitation projects aimed at improving community quality of life through planning and execution of hydraulic infrastructure, aqueduct, sewer and drainage systems, as well as structuring sanitation and discharge management plans. We complement these actions with comprehensive solid waste management plans, promoting proper resource management and contributing to healthier, sustainable and resilient environments.

environmentalRestoration.title: Environmental restoration and recovery of degraded areas
environmentalRestoration.description: We execute comprehensive bioengineering solutions aimed at environmental restoration and the recovery of degraded areas by rehabilitating ecosystems affected by erosion processes. We carry out geomorphological interventions and decontamination actions in rivers and water bodies to restore their natural balance, mitigate bank erosion and protect shorelines, contributing to the conservation of landscapes, forests and water systems.

sanitation.title: Basic sanitation
sanitation.description: Design and implementation of wastewater treatment systems and sanitation solutions for rural communities.

recovery.title: Environmental recovery
recovery.description: Ecological restoration of degraded ecosystems, erosion control and slope stabilization.

hydraulics.title: Hydraulics
hydraulics.description: Design and construction of hydraulic infrastructure, watershed management and drainage systems.

urbanism.title: Urbanism
urbanism.description: Sustainable urban planning, public space design and territorial management.

education.title: Environmental education
education.description: Training and awareness programs for communities, institutions and companies.

design.title: Design and construction
design.description: Civil infrastructure projects with sustainable approach and environmental responsibility.

closing.title: Engineering makes sense when it understands the territory
closing.description: We integrate technical analysis, environmental vision and institutional support to develop sustainable solutions, adapted to each context and community.

hero.title: Projects
hero.description: Discover our portfolio of projects executed in different regions of the country.
hero.manifesto: Each project reflects our technical experience, our work with communities and our commitment to sustainable and functional environmental solutions.

card1.title: Bioengineering works and erosion control on slopes

card3.title: Comprehensive management and maintenance of urban gardens

card4.title: Geomorphological recovery of the Ca√±averalejo river

featured.title: Featured Projects
featured.intro: Selection of featured projects that represent our commitment to sustainable engineering, environmental management and comprehensive territorial development.

urbanism.title: Urbanism
urbanism.intro: We design and transform urban spaces with people, nature and the territory as a whole in mind. At FUDAMBIENT we understand urbanism as a tool to improve quality of life, strengthen public space and reconnect the city with its ecosystems. Our projects combine green infrastructure, environmental criteria and community participation, creating more livable, resilient and functional environments. Each intervention seeks to balance technical and social aspects, promoting more sustainable, inclusive cities adapted to their local context.

gardens.title: Urban gardens and green infrastructure
gardens.text: In agreement with the Administrative Department of Environmental Management - DAGMA, we implement urban gardens as green infrastructure strategies aimed at recovering and qualifying public space, improving ecological connectivity and strengthening urban biodiversity. These interventions integrate landscape, environmental and functional criteria, promoting more livable, resilient and environmentally balanced urban environments.

trees.title: Urban tree management and maintenance
trees.text: We have extensive experience in continuous urban tree management and maintenance processes aimed at improving ecological functionality, urban safety and the sustainability of green areas in the city. Our work integrates technical, environmental and operational criteria, strengthening the relationship between urban infrastructure, landscape and community well-being over time.

urbanism.footer: These approaches are reflected in the urbanism projects executed by FUDAMBIENT in different contexts of Valle del Cauca, evidencing a combination of technical experience, territorial work and sustainable results.

sanitation.title: Basic Sanitation
sanitation.subtitle: We implement decentralized solutions for drinking water and wastewater treatment in rural and suburban communities, integrating health education, operational sustainability and community ownership.

feature.title: Basic sanitation that works in the territory
feature.text: At FUDAMBIENT we don't just design basic sanitation solutions: we execute, accompany and leave them operating over time. Our Individual Wastewater Treatment Systems (SITARES) have been installed in most municipalities of Valle del Cauca, adapting to rural and community contexts and achieving outstanding removal efficiencies.

hero.lead1: SITARES are implemented through a structured technical process that includes diagnosis and design, installation, commissioning and continuous support, ensuring their proper operation over time.
hero.lead2: Previously, we carry out technical studies on the property to verify the viability of the system, evaluating conditions such as soil, slope, water table level and regulatory distances, ensuring a safe and efficient implementation.
hero.lead3: We integrate health education and community strengthening in each phase of the process, promoting responsible use, proper maintenance and system sustainability, in harmony with the protection of water resources.
hero.cta: Click here to learn about the latest version of this project

projects.title: Featured technical projects
projects.text: In addition to the implementation of SITARES, FUDAMBIENT has led projects of high technical complexity in design, consulting and construction of hydraulic infrastructure. These projects reflect our capacity to address the complete cycle of sanitation and water supply, from technical studies and specialized design, to construction, commissioning and optimization of systems for safe water access.

ginebra.title: Design and consulting in hydraulic infrastructure
ginebra.subtitle: Ginebra and Guacar√≠ ‚Äì Valle del Cauca
ginebra.text: Development of technical studies and comprehensive designs for water collection, adduction, conduction, storage and drinking water treatment plant systems. The project integrated territorial, hydraulic and regulatory analyses to propose viable, safe solutions adapted to local conditions, strengthening the planning of municipal aqueducts and their long-term sustainability.

pasto.title: Construction and commissioning of drinking water treatment systems
pasto.subtitle: Pasto, Nari√±o
pasto.text: Design, construction and commissioning of drinking water treatment plants and disinfection systems for rural and suburban aqueducts, aimed at improving access to safe water and ensuring efficient operation of infrastructure. This project consolidated FUDAMBIENT's experience in the execution of hydraulic works, integrating technical, operational and sustainability criteria to ensure its correct operation over time.

education.title: Environmental Education
education.subtitle: We design and implement pedagogical and participatory processes that accompany environmental projects and community infrastructure, strengthening ownership, care for the territory and long-term sustainability.

howWeWork.title: How do we work?
howWeWork.text: We apply environmental education where it is key to ensure operation, care and sustainability of the interventions.

step1.title: Diagnose
step1.text: We identify context, actors, practices and needs of the territory.

step2.title: Design
step2.text: We build methodologies, guides, materials and activity banks according to the project.

step3.title: Implement
step3.text: We execute sessions, workshops and participatory actions with a practical approach.

step4.title: Evaluate and sustain
step4.text: We apply evaluation instruments, provide feedback and leave installed capacities.

instruments.title: Instruments and evidence
instruments.text: Below, we show you a small sample of our activity bank and evaluation instruments to ensure quality, learning and ownership over time.

sitar.title: Training for SITAR use and management
sitar.text: We apply environmental education to the use, operation and maintenance of SITAR to ensure sustainability, ownership and proper system operation over time.

bank.title: Activity bank and evidence
bank.text: Visual record of workshops, sessions, materials and community participation processes.

application.title: Cross-cutting application by project type
application.text: Incorporate environmental education as a cross-cutting axis to strengthen operation, territorial care and sustainability of each intervention.

restoration.title: River and strategic ecosystem restoration
restoration.text: Integration of geomorphological recovery, ecological restoration and erosion control actions to recover the functionality of rivers, slopes and degraded ecosystems, reducing risks and strengthening territorial resilience.

sitares.title: SITARES and basic sanitation
sitares.text: Ensuring proper operation, maintenance and community ownership of sanitation systems, promoting water care habits and long-term sustainability of implemented solutions.

hmp.title: HMP / landscape management tools
hmp.text: Promotion of sustainable practices and community follow-up processes for landscape management, integrating environmental, productive and social criteria that strengthen the community-territory relationship.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.text: Visual evidence of community participation, pedagogical activities and follow-up to sustain interventions over time.

education.footer: Integrating environmental education in projects allows sustaining results over time, improving community ownership and strengthening territorial management.

restoration.title: Ecological Restoration
restoration.subtitle: We implement environmental recovery and bioengineering interventions to stabilize slopes, reduce sediments and recover degraded river sections, integrating diagnosis, construction and sustainability in the territory.

step1.title: Diagnose üß≠
step1.text: Characterize terrain conditions and fluvial dynamics; prioritize critical sections and causes of degradation.

step2.title: Design üìê
step2.text: Define bioengineering, environmental hydraulics and sediment management solutions according to context.

step3.title: Intervene üõ†Ô∏è
step3.text: Execute works: desilting, reshaping, stabilization, living structures and channel management.

step4.title: Recover üå±
step4.text: Restore coverage and ecological functionality; mitigate erosive processes and environmental liabilities.

step5.title: Sustain üìä
step5.text: Accompany with environmental education, monitoring and maintenance to ensure results over time.

rivers.title: Rivers: geomorphological recovery and desilting
rivers.text: We recover the hydraulic and geomorphological functionality of rivers and streams through desilting, channel reshaping and sediment management. These interventions reduce flood and scour risks, strengthen fluvial resilience and improve the relationship between communities and their water bodies.

bioengineering.title: Bioengineering works and erosion control
bioengineering.text: We design and implement bioengineering solutions and living structures for the stabilization of slopes, hillsides and unstable areas. We integrate natural techniques and support works that allow controlling erosion, mitigating mass movements and recovering soil functionality with environmental and technical criteria.

mining.title: Recovery of mining liabilities
mining.text: We intervene in areas affected by legal and illegal mining through terrain stabilization processes, environmental liability control and ecological restoration. Our approach seeks to reduce geotechnical and environmental risks, recover ecosystem functionality and promote safe and sustainable uses of the territory.

sediments.title: Sediment control and stabilization (laterization / mass movements)
sediments.text: We reduce sediment contribution and mitigate degradation processes through civil works, soil management and stabilization of critical areas affected by laterization and mass movements, protecting infrastructure and improving territorial safety.

restoration.footer: Integrating technical diagnosis, field intervention and social sustainability allows recovering ecological functionality and reducing risks associated with territorial degradation.

howWeRestore.title: How do we restore the territory?
howWeRestore.text: To address these issues, FUDAMBIENT applies complementary ecological restoration approaches that articulate landscape, bioengineering and technical work. Each approach adapts to the territorial context and seeks to guarantee sustainable, functional and lasting results over time.

hmp.title: HMP ‚Äì Landscape management and ecological restoration
hmp.text: We approach ecological restoration from comprehensive landscape management through the implementation of wooden log barriers, living fences, revegetation with native species and isolation of recovering areas. These techniques allow recovering vegetation cover, stabilizing gentle slopes and reconnecting ecological dynamics in degraded areas. We prioritize the maintenance of previously intervened areas, ensuring that restoration consolidates over time and integrates harmoniously into the productive and community territory.

bioeng.title: Bioengineering and erosion control
bioeng.text: We implement bioengineering solutions for soil stabilization and erosion control through live log barriers, palisades, bag retaining walls, soil bags and mixed structures with natural materials. These techniques are applied on slopes, hillsides and unstable areas to reduce sediment input, mitigate mass movements and promote progressive soil recovery, combining environmental, hydraulic and geotechnical criteria according to site conditions.

construction.title: Construction for ecological restoration
construction.text: We develop civil works aimed at supporting ecological restoration processes and environmental impact control, through the construction of retaining walls, drainage works, energy dissipation structures and runoff management. These interventions allow stabilizing critical areas, controlling sediment transport and protecting infrastructure, integrating engineering solutions as technical support for environmental recovery and risk reduction in the territory.

hero.title: Transforming territories with engineering and sustainability
hero.subtitle: Since 2005, FUDAMBIENT works on sustainable community development through environmental projects, social engineering and participatory construction.

municipalities.label: Municipalities intervened in Valle del Cauca

videos.subtitle: Real stories that show the impact of our projects on the territory.

gardens.subtitle: Learn about the impact of our intervention on the city's green infrastructure.
gardens.aria: Testimonial about urban gardens and green infrastructure

sitares.subtitle: Explore the latest report on our work in water resource care and environmental education.

testimonials.title: Voices from the territory
testimonials.subtitle: The words of those who live the impact of our work are our greatest recognition.

quote.text: "True engineering is not just calculations and structures, it is the ability to listen, learn and build together with communities."
quote.author: ‚Äî FUDAMBIENT Philosophy

1.quote: With the sanitation system and training from the FUDAMBIENT team, we learned to operate and maintain it. Now there are fewer odors, fewer diseases and the community organizes to sustain it over time. Also, this process gave us peace of mind and confidence knowing we have an adequate solution for our village.
1.author: Cristopher Serna

2.quote: Before, this space felt neglected and you would pass by quickly. With the gardens, it's now a pleasure to walk; the environment is fresher, safer and more pleasant. You can tell it was designed for people, inviting you to stay and enjoy. As pedestrians, we feel that public space has improved and that the surroundings contribute to the neighborhood's well-being.
2.author: Natalia Rodr√≠guez

3.quote: During the stream recovery, we understood that restoring is not just about doing works, but caring for the territory together. FUDAMBIENT accompanied us step by step, listening to the community and teaching us how to protect this space. Today we know how to prevent risks and value the stream as part of our lives.
3.author: Marleny Collazos
3.community: El Cogollo Stream, Esneda Neighborhood, Dagua

methodology.title: Our methodology
methodology.subtitle: A proven process that integrates quality engineering, community participation and sustainability focus at every stage.

1.title: Community dialogue
1.description: We meet with the community to understand their needs, priorities and local knowledge. The territory speaks, we listen.

2.title: Technical diagnosis
2.description: We conduct soil, water, topography and environmental impact studies with professional rigor and territorial focus.

3.title: Participatory design
3.description: We co-create solutions that integrate engineering, local knowledge and environmental sustainability.

4.title: Construction and support
4.description: We execute with local labor when possible, generating employment and project ownership.

5.title: Monitoring and sustainability
5.description: We support maintenance, strengthen local capacities and measure long-term impact.

allies.title: Allies and institutional partnerships
allies.subtitle: Our work is strengthened through solid partnerships with environmental authorities and territorial actors.

1.fullName: Regional Autonomous Corporation of Valle del Cauca
1.description: Regional environmental authority with whom we work on water resource management and conservation projects.

2.description: Municipal entity that coordinates our sustainability and environmental management initiatives in the territory.

mascot.text: We believe in an accessible engineering that listens to the territory and works alongside communities.

contact.title: Would you like to talk about your project?
contact.subtitle: We are here to help you make your sustainable development ideas a reality. Tell us about your project and we will respond soon.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.note: This will open your email app with the message ready to send.
